{"id":931139452,"question_id":2721,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1681111218,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"34 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/931139452/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sum of Distances","memory":"66 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long[] distance(int[] nums) {\n        Map<Integer,long[]> map=new HashMap<>();\n        long res[]=new long[nums.length];\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.length;i++){\n            long curr[]=map.getOrDefault(nums[i],new long[]{0,0});\n            if(curr[1]>0){\n                res[i]+=(long)(curr[1]*i)-curr[0];\n            }\n            curr[0]+=i;\n            curr[1]+=1;\n            map.put(nums[i],curr);\n        }\n        map=new HashMap<>();\n        for(int i=nums.length-1;i>=0;i--){\n            long curr[]=map.getOrDefault(nums[i],new long[]{0,0});\n            if(curr[1]>0){\n                res[i]+=(long)Math.abs((curr[1]*i)-curr[0]);\n            }\n            curr[0]+=i;\n            curr[1]+=1;\n            map.put(nums[i],curr);\n        }\n        return res;  \n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sum-of-distances","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
